We need to have small 150 Sec Video which we can see the Detail of our solution .   We have some of other Software as well which we will hand over once you are awarded and confirmed and shows us your first data sheet and we can approved.So HayaVision is the Main Company and under Hayavision there is Solution Call Flux Solution and under Flux Solution there are below products.These are my Products Name.FLUX AXINIt is Like a Multi Screen with layout Control.FLUX COURANTIt is Multi Screen with PresentationFLUX C TOPIt is a Client Application as Desktop application as windowsFLUX C HTML 5It is a Client Application in a Web based.FLUX CLOUDIt is our Media Server and DatabaseFLUX XOGARRecorded Video and Images Tape Play out.FLUX V KonektorIt is Virtual Screen capture Model to stream between 2 Computer .FLUX VIRTAIt is Video Encoder to connect with all the CameraFLUX APPLEIt is Client Application to control and view on the iPadFLUX PLANISTAIt is the SchedulerFLUX PACS SilverIt is medical PACS versionFLUX PACS GoldIt is Medical PACS with Extra OptionsFLUX DICOMIt is to view the Documents in Medical OptionFLUX MAYA DICOMIt is to the View Medical document in 3D ViewFLUX MONOIt is the Schedule , Telemedicine Solution. where 1 Doctor , 1 Patient and 1 Nurse are connected.

desc: I would like to create a video to market a new service that my company is offering. It's an egift service that allows people to purchase products in our boutique, and send notifications electronically throughout the process.I would like the video to be realistic, and not cartoon animations.Scene: I envision a girlfriend and boyfriend chatting. The girlfriend mentions that she would love something from our boutique for her birthday/christmas/etc. The next scene the boyfriend goes to our site, and the video shows how to go about placing the egift order. It shows the notifications sent to the girlfriend, boyfriend. The last scene shows the girlfriend opening the door and getting her gift. Then it has an image of our logo with our website address.The video should be around 1:30-2 minutes and include voiceover, animations, music and script video produced in hd 4K quality and MP4.Examples[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]where it says 'watch how it works.' - [url removed, login to view]

desc: project is for ‘Revolution Films’ and their new movie ‘Space War’. Space Warfrom the outset has been a high investment project for Revolution Films as apart from the film itself there are many spin-offs which include a successful cartoon, video games, toy figures and spaceships, and other merchandising.A bit about the film itself – Space War is a £70 million block buster based on the invasion of Earth by an alien race (the Giganti) and its superior technology. The film is set in 2014 and begins with the aliens attacking China, Russia, and rapidly occupying most of Asia before stopping at the edge of Europe. Despite a combined resistance from earth the invasion has been rapid taking just 3 days. The reason the aliens have stopped is to offer the surviving humans a chance to surrender before a second attack would commence. The film ends at this point as there is to be a sequel where earth attempts to repel the invasion.In terms of technology key elements of the invasion force are –•	Xarky Storm Attack craft – spacecraft equivalent to advanced jet fighters being 5 metres in length.•	Coven Command Bases – These are large space battle stations that are used to launch attacks on earth. These measure around 2 miles in length. Housed here are the Xarky Storm Attack craft, battle robots, robot drones and the aliens themselves.Earths defences•	Earth has access to only conventional ships and aircraft carriers, planes, helicopters, and missiles.As a designer you have been asked to create for the above film scenario the following media resources and application –•	You need to create to your own specification a model of a battle robot that could appear in the film.•	You must create an alien spacecraft to your own design that could be used in the invasion of Earth.Price is negotiable.. I also have other requirements will send attachment for selected freelancersSkills: 3D Animation, 3D Modelling, 3D Rendering, Animation, PhotoshopSee more: war specification, war 3d model, video to 3d model, toy 3d model, spacecraft design, space 3d model, set 3d model, missiles 3d model for games, large 3d model, key 3d model, jet 3d model, humans 3d model, design by humans, create your own cartoon design, create your own 3d model, create your 3d model, create a cartoon video, craft 3d model, china 3d model, cartoon scenario, cartoon 3d model animation, animation cartoon application, animation 3d games, alien 3d model, aircraft 3d model
title: 3D Modelling with 3ds max with explanation video

desc: Hi everyone, I am looking for an animation to be done for my business. I am a home buyer and i purchase directly from home owner.There are many benefits of selling directly to me rather then a real estate agent and or putting it on the real estate market and i will share them below. If you can animate all this with a female voice over explaining some of the benefits of using a direct cash buyer like me rather than turning to a real estate agency. I will list more information below which you may use to reference.Also here are some video just so you have an idea of what i am asking for. Like i said a voice over with a lady is important if it is difficult to include you may do it without, but this can give you an idea of how it should look. The story line is not the same.Youtube:[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]Please include the followingSelling w/ An Agent	SOLD To Allan Buys HomesCommissions / Fees:	6% on average is paid by you, the seller	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONEWho Pays Closing Costs?:	2% on average is paid by you, the seller	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONE – We pay all costsInspection & Financing Contingency*:	Yes, up to 15% of sales fall through	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONEAppraisal Needed:	Yes, sale is often subject to appraisal	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONE – We make cash offersAverage Days Until Sold:	+/- 91 Days	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes IMMEDIATE CASH OFFERNumber of Showings:	It Depends	1 (Just Us)Closing Date:	30-60 +/- days after accepting buyers offer	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes The Date Of YOUR CHOICEWho Pays For Repairs?:	Negotiated During Inspection Period	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONE – We pay for all repairsAlso pleasse include some other things to make story line better.Selling To Allan Buys Homes vs. Listing With A Local AgentEven in a sellers market like New York, it’s smart to look at your options and see what will actually help you best reach your goals with the sale of your house. While you may be able to get a higher “top line” sales price listing with a local Jersey City, Hudson County, New Jersey agent, that doesn’t always boil down to more money in your pocket or less headache. Dive into the details below to compare your options.Work The Numbers And See Which Way Helps You Get There…When you really work the numbers you start to see the real benefits that each way of selling your house offers.Yes, here at Allan Buys Homes we won’t be able to offer you full retail value for your house… but we also offer other benefits that going the traditional house sale route can’t offer.Like…From offer to close and cash in your hand in as little as 7 daysYou can get rid of the headache of that property fast and avoid paying any more utility payments, tax payments, insurance payments, mortgage payments, you get the drill. If you list your house and wait 90+ days to close… you have to figure in all of the costs of holding that property during the time you have that property listed and are waiting for the property to close.Don’t worry about paying those pesky closing fees (we’ve got you covered)Because we are a full-service professional home buyer here in , we make it easy for you. We pay for all of the closing costs. What we offer you is what you get (of course minus any mortgage payoff or other encumbrances on the property). Pretty refreshing eh?So when you add up the time you could save by working with Allan Buys Homes , the no-hassle experience, and the money you’ll save on commissions, fees, and holding costs while you wait to sell the traditional route… for many area home owners selling to a professional house buyer is the best viable option.
